button.name: 4Comm2VolumeUp
button.code: send {Shift Down}{Ctrl Down}{Alt Down}{NumpadAdd}{Alt Up}{Ctrl Up}{Shift Up}

button.name: 4Comm2VolumeDown
button.code: send {Shift Down}{Ctrl Down}{Alt Down}{NumpadSub}{Alt Up}{Ctrl Up}{Shift Up}

button.name: 07HSINav
button.code: send {Shift Down}{Ctrl Down}{Alt Down}{i}{Alt Up}{Ctrl Up}{Shift Up}

button.name: 11FuelSwitchNorm
button.code: send {Shift Down}{Ctrl Down}{Alt Down}{F6}{Alt Up}{Ctrl Up}{Shift Up}

button.name: 11FuelSwitchResv
button.code: send {Shift Down}{Ctrl Down}{Alt Down}{F2}{Alt Up}{Ctrl Up}{Shift Up}

button.name: 11FuelSwitchWingInt
button.code: send {Shift Down}{Ctrl Down}{Alt Down}{F3}{Alt Up}{Ctrl Up}{Shift Up}

button.name: 11FuelSwitchWingExt
button.code: send {Shift Down}{Ctrl Down}{Alt Down}{F5}{Alt Up}{Ctrl Up}{Shift Up}

button.name: 11FuelSwitchCenterExt
button.code: send {Shift Down}{Ctrl Down}{Alt Down}{F7}{Alt Up}{Ctrl Up}{Shift Up}

button.name: 11FuelSwitchTest
